m_szDocSumamry: Global Electric Car Sales Surpasses Half A Million In 2015 Originally published on EV Obsession . More than half a million plug-in electric vehicles were delivered to buyers globally in 2015 — just under 540,000, to be nearly exact — according to new figures from EV-Volumes , an EV sales database and consultancy now partnering with EV Obsession  and CleanTechnica . These new numbers represent a roughly 70% increase over the figures for 2014 — and that’s after the 2014 figures represented a roughly 50% increase on the 2013 ones.
